name: skin-deep
description: Testing helpers for use with React's shallowRender test utils.

scripts.test: npm run react:14 && mocha && npm run react:15 && mocha && npm run react:155 && mocha
scripts.react:clean: rimraf node_modules/react node_modules/react-dom node_modules/react-addons-test-utils react-test-renderer react-addons-create-fragment @types/react create-react-class prop-types
scripts.react:14: rimraf node_modules/.bin/npm && npm run react:clean && npm i react@0.14 react-dom@0.14 react-addons-test-utils@0.14 react-addons-create-fragment@0.14 @types/react@0.14 && npm install
scripts.react:15: rimraf node_modules/.bin/npm && npm run react:clean && npm i react@15.4 react-dom@15.4 react-addons-test-utils@15.4 react-addons-create-fragment@15.4 @types/react@15 && npm install
scripts.react:155: rimraf node_modules/.bin/npm && npm run react:clean && npm i react@15.5 react-dom@15.5 react-test-renderer@15.5 react-addons-create-fragment@15.5 @types/react@15 create-react-class@15.5 prop-types@15.5 && npm install

author: Glen Mailer <glen@stainlessed.co.uk>
